sentence.value: From September 1989 to January 1991 he underwent the complete course of general space training and was qualified as a test cosmonaut, and then till March 1992 he undertook advanced training for the Soyuz-TM transport vehicle and Mir station flight.
sentence.annotated-sentence: From [[September 1989|1989]] to [[January 1991|1991]] he underwent the complete course of general [[space|Space]] [[training|Advanced_Training]] and was qualified as a test cosmonaut, and then till [[March 1992|1992]] he undertook [[advanced training|Advanced_Training]] for the [[Soyuz-TM|Soyuz-TM]] [[transport|Transport]] [[vehicle|Automobile]] and Mir [[station|Station]] [[flight|Flight]].
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: From September 1989 to January 1991 he underwent the complete course of general space training and was qualified as a test cosmonaut, and then till March 1992 he undertook advanced training for the Soyuz-TM transport vehicle and Mir station flight.

sentence.value: In 1992 he was selected as the backup flight engineer of the Soyuz TM-15 joint Russian-French mission, and consequently nominated as the flight engineer of the prime crew of Soyuz TM-16.
